## IHasBubble interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IHasBubble 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [bubbleIsVisible()](./blockly.ihasbubble.bubbleisvisible.md) |  |
|  [getBubble()](./blockly.ihasbubble.getbubble.md) | <p>Returns the current IBubble that implementations are managing, or null if there isn't one.</p><p>Note that this cannot be expected to return null if bubbleIsVisible() returns false, i.e., the nullability of the returned bubble does not necessarily imply visibility.</p> |
|  [setBubbleVisible(visible)](./blockly.ihasbubble.setbubblevisible.md) | Sets whether the bubble is open or not. |
